channel.title: PI Npc Drops
channel.description:
Hey, I have made Strykerwyrms at home and i want them to hit harder. Where do i edit that at? And everytme you kill them you get everything in one drop. how do i make it so: When you kill them it 100% Gives you bones and 5% everything else?!@# :(
#Dust Devil 1624:200 560:75 1093:1 1147:1 1127:1 1185:1 1275:1 1333:1 1373:1 562:75 805:10 3140:1 1249:1 2690:1 2693:1 2815:1 2690:1 2693:1 2815:1
Heres a code i have the: 1624:200 whats the 200 do ?

item.title: PI Npc Drops
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

No, it’s the higher the number gets how LESS chance you get on receiving the drop it means (NPC ID):1 would always be a rare drop (NPC ID):2 would be 50% of the times a rare drop and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Npc Drops
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

so the higher the number the higher the percentage of rare drops?

Read full topic

@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

ok thank you verry much

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Change the number to 60 or something.

@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

item.title: PI Npc Drops
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

200 is the %. Just add another line like 1624:1 bonesid:1.

NpcHandler and npc.cfg for it to hit harder.

Read full topic
